alert.note: Alert for Ojai Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 05 at 7:35PM PST until January 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 degrees expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Ojai Valley. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM Saturday to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
